Article Title: NFL Honors 2025: “Why in the Hell Is She Even There?” Fans Question Travis Kelce’s Ex, Kayla Nicole’s Presence at NFL Honors
Article Text:
Kayla Nicole and boyfriend Travis Kelce shared a kiss after the Chiefs’ win over the Raiders - Instagram

Kayla Nicole Shines at NFL Honors as a Seasoned Sports Host

I Am Athlete Daily

Fans Speculate Over Her Presence, Especially Amid Travis Kelce & Taylor Swift Buzz

The 2025 NFL Honors in New Orleans wasn’t just another night for athletes and sports stars—it had fans questioning: What was Kayla Nicole, Travis Kelce ’s ex, doing at the event? Her presence certainly made waves, especially given Kelce's current spotlight with Taylor Swift . Here's what went down when Kayla Nicole made her appearance and why it became the talk of the night.Looking every bit the professional, Kayla Nicole hit the NFL Honors red carpet as a sports broadcaster and host foron Revolt TV. She wasn’t just there for the glitz and glamour—Kayla was in full work mode, interviewing none other than Deion Sanders and his son, Shedeur Sanders. Fans were quick to notice how comfortable she was in the spotlight, but one moment, in particular, got people talking: a friendly hug between Kayla and Coach Prime himself, Deion Sanders.The unexpected hug sent social media into a frenzy, with fans speculating about its true meaning. Was it just a friendly, professional exchange, or did it hint at something deeper? Some fans took it as a simple moment of mutual respect, while others couldn’t help but wonder if there was more to the story. Could this be a sign of rekindled feelings, or was it just a coincidence?Kayla's attendance stood out for reasons beyond her career achievements. With Travis Kelce currently in the limelight thanks to his high-profile relationship with Taylor Swift, fans couldn't help but question her appearance at such a public event. Social media exploded with speculation—why was Kelce’s ex at the NFL Honors?But Kayla is no stranger to the spotlight, and this isn’t her first time attending major events. Beyond her relationship with Kelce, Kayla has built a career as a knowledgeable sports broadcaster with a degree from Pepperdine University, and she’s clearly earned her place among the NFL elite. In fact, Kayla predicted that Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes would "seal the deal" in the upcoming Super Bowl, showing just how much football knowledge she brings to the table.While fans continue to speculate about Kayla Nicole’s appearance at the NFL Honors, one thing is clear—she’s got a life and career of her own, independent of her past relationship with Travis Kelce. Whether she’s making waves in sports commentary, reality TV, or simply enjoying the spotlight, Kayla keeps fans talking—and that’s exactly what she’s known for.Also read - Deion Sanders and Travis Kelce’s Ex Kayla Nicole Get Touchy on NFL Honors Red Carpet – Fans Take Notice!
Article Summary: Travis kelce's ex, kayla nicole, attended the 2025 nfl honors in new orleans. Her presence at the event made waves, especially given kelce’s current spotlight with taylor swift. Kayla is no stranger to the spotlight, and this isn’t her first time attending major events.

Article Title: Could Taylor Swift get spotted wearing a $12 million engagement ring today? Speculation grows over a proposal at Super Bowl LIX
Article Text:
Image via Tatiana/BACKGRID

Taylor Swift Might Get Proposed Today At The Super Bowl LIX With A Ring Worth $12 Million



Taylor Swift Is Confirmed To Be Attending The Super Bowl LIX Today





Check out our live coverage of Super Bowl LIX and find details on how to watch Super Bowl live on Times of India.



Super Bowl LIX is beginning in a few hours and fans are all excited to watch Taylor Swift cheering on for her boyfriend, the NFL star, Travis Kelce. The two have been dating for over a year now and looking at how close they have become, fans are speculating an engagement soon. There are also many speculations that Taylor Swift might get proposed to by Travis Kelce if the Kansas City Chiefs win the trophy today.Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have been able to build a pretty strong relationship and the two are quite close to each other’s family as well. As per RadarOnline’s report in December, the NFL star, Travis Kelce, had been “looking for engagement rings”.But of course, it is just not any ring for the billionaire pop star. As per RadarOnline’s source, Travis Kelce is looking for a ring worth a whopping $12 million. The reason for this is, "The rule is the ring should be worth a good three months' salary.”In the last few days, Travis Kelce has been asked about his thoughts on proposing to his girlfriend, Taylor Swift, at the Super Bowl and he neither denied this idea nor accepted it. A few days ago, when a reporter asked him about giving a ring to Taylor Swift at the Super Bowl, Travis Kelce gave a pretty cheeky reply to it. As per The Independent, he said, “A Super Bowl ring? Next question,”While there are no confirmed reports whether Travis Kelce will be proposing to Taylor Swift today, fans are desperately hoping for it.A fan took to X and wrote, “As a Taylor Swift fan, two things I don’t want to see happen today: 1. Her popping out as a guest during Kendrick’s Super Bowl halftime show to sing Bad Blood 2. A Taylor / Travis marriage proposal at the Super Bowl if the Chiefs win”Another fan wrote, “Your daily reminder leading up to the super bowl that the Chiefs will win and Taylor Swift will get a marriage proposal.”Many fans also feel that Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are pretty private people and would like their proposal to be private rather than so public, in front of billions of fans. But then again, today is one of the most important days in Travis Kelce’s life so there is a possibility that if the Kansas City Chiefs win today, we will all see Travis Kelce going down on one knee at the stadium with a beautiful ring worth a whopping $12 million.Super Bowl LIX begins at 6:30 PM ET and Taylor Swift is confirmed to be attending the match today.Also Read: Philadelphia Eagles player's comments about Taylor Swift raise eyebrows, sparking outrage before Super Bowl LIX
Article Summary: Super bowl lix begins at 6:30 pm et and taylor swift is confirmed to be attending the match today. There are many speculations that taylor swift might get proposed to by travis kelce if the kansas city chiefs win the trophy today. As per radaronline’s source,ravis kelce is looking for a ring worth a whopping $12 million.

Article Title: Chiefs owner’s daughter, Gracie Hunt, speaks out on Donald Trump’s recent post about Kansas City Chiefs
Article Text:
Image via The Kansas City Chiefs/Sydney Schneider

Clark Hunt’s Daughter, Gracie Hunt Talks About Donald Trump’s Post On X About Kansas City Chiefs



The Philadelphia Eagles Are Ready To Face The Kansas City Chiefs At Super Bowl LIX



The Super Bowl LIX is all set to begin in a few hours and the newly elected president of the United States of America, Donald Trump, will be making history by being the first president in office to actually watch the Super Bowl live. This will be Donald Trump’s second time watching the Super Bowl live after watching it for the first time in 1992. While Donald Trump had earlier refused to answer which team he is supporting, it seems like now he has revealed that and Kansas City Chiefs ’ owner’s daughter, Gracie Hunt , has a few things things to say about it.Even though Donald Trump has refused to answer the team he is supporting in Super Bowl LIX, he has hinted at a quarterback. Many fans believe Donald Trump has been hinting at Patrick Mahomes, the quarterback of the Kansas City Chiefs.When the Kansas City Chiefs won the AFC Championship against the Buffalo Bills a few weeks ago, Donald Trump’s post on X had gone viral. The post read as, “Congratulations to the Kansas City Chiefs. What a GREAT Team, Coach, Quarterback, and virtually everything else, including those fantastic FANS, that voted for me (MAGA!) in record numbers.”Now it seems like Clark Hunt’s daughter, Gracie Hunt had a few things to say about it when she appeared on the “Gaines for Girls” podcast. Gracie Hunt spoke about how reading Donald Trump’s post on X for the Kansas City Chiefs has been “pretty awesome” and “absolutely incredible”.She continues, “Sometimes I just look at whoever I’m talking to and I’m like yeah that just wasn’t on my 2025 bingo card.”With the Super Bowl LIX beginning in just a few hours, many fans feel Donald Trump’s presence in the Super Bowl LIX is a sign that the Kansas City Chiefs are set to break records and win the trophy again.The Kansas City Chiefs have already made history by being the only team in the NFL which has made an appearance at the Super Bowl for seven times now. In the last couple of years, the Kansas City Chiefs have been able to manage a winning streak at the Super Bowl but now they face the Philadelphia Eagles.Saquon Barkley led the Philadelphia Eagles has become one of the strongest teams in the NFL and they are all set to face the Kansas City Chiefs and win the match tonight.Super Bowl LIX is all set to begin at 6:30 PM ET.Also Read: Travis Kelce and Patrick Mahomes set to gift Rolex worth close to $22,000 to Chiefs members if they win Super Bowl LIX, with a Caribbean vacation planned
Article Summary: Super bowl lix is all set to begin in just a few hours. Donald trump will be making history by being the first president in office to actually watch the super bowl live. The kansas city chiefs are the only team in the nfl which has made an appearance at the superbowl for seven times now.

NFL Super Bowl 2025 Streaming Details



Check out our live coverage of Super Bowl LIX and find details on where to watch Super Bowl 2025 live on Times of India.



The biggest event in American football, the Super Bowl, is set to take place on February 9th, 2025. This year's championship game will be held in New Orleans, Louisiana, marking another exciting chapter in the NFL’s history. Super Bowl LIX will feature a highly anticipated rematch between the Kansas City Chiefs and the Philadelphia Eagles, making it a must-watch for football fans worldwide.The game will kick off at 6:30 p.m. EST, which translates to 5:00 a.m. IST on February 10 for viewers in India. The Chiefs, led by Patrick Mahomes, are chasing their third consecutive Super Bowl title, while the Eagles, with Jalen Hurts at the helm, aim to reclaim the Lombardi Trophy.Fans across different time zones will have to adjust their schedules to catch the action live. Below are the kickoff timings for various regions:Fans in India can catch all the live action of Super Bowl 2025 on the Star Sports Network, which will broadcast the game across multiple channels. Additionally, the game will be available for live streaming on Disney+ Hotstar, ensuring that Indian viewers don’t miss out on the thrilling showdown.In the United States, Super Bowl LIX will be broadcast live on Fox Sports, the official network for this year’s event. The game will also be accessible via various streaming platforms, catering to viewers who prefer to watch online.For those looking to stream the event, multiple platforms will provide live coverage. In the USA, fans can stream Super Bowl 2025 on FuboTV, NFL+, and Tubi, offering convenient options for viewers on the go. Indian fans, apart from Star Sports and Disney+ Hotstar, may also check other regional streaming services carrying the live broadcast.With the Chiefs aiming for a historic three-peat and the Eagles seeking redemption, Super Bowl LIX promises to deliver high-intensity football action. Be sure to tune in and witness one of the most anticipated matchups in NFL history.
Article Summary: The biggest event in american football, the super bowl, is set to take place on february 9th, 2025. This year's championship game will be held in new orleans, louisiana, marking another exciting chapter in the nfl’s history. Super bowl lix will feature a rematch between the kansas city chiefs and the philadelphia eagles, making it a must-watch for football fans worldwide.

Article Title: “That's very frustrating”: FOX Reporter Erin Andrews suggests avoiding solo Super Bowl viewing at a bar
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Erin Andrews and Charissa Thompson's candid podcast conversation:The impact of unsolicited football opinions



Episode 304: Buttery, Soft Leather | Calm Down Podcast

Erin Andrews advised Super Bowl fans not to watch alone at a bar to avoid frustrating, unsolicited opinions. Co-host Charissa Thompson shared a similar experience, highlighting challenges in public sports discussions. Andrews and Thompson have released dozens of episodes since last year's Super Bowl. These episodes cover all sorts of topics from Taylor Swift's Eras Tour to the NFL playoffs.Erin Andrews, a Fox NFL Sunday star, recently advised Super Bowl fans not to watch the game alone at a bar. On her podcast Calm Down with Erin and Charissa, she explained that solo viewers might have to deal with unsolicited and often frustrating football opinions from strangers. Her co-host, Charissa Thompson, agreed, recalling a time when she nearly confronted someone over their comments at an airport bar."If you really, really love football and you don't want people to give their opinions about it, don't go to a bar and sit there by yourself," she warned."People think that they know what they're talking about. But they don't know. And that is very frustrating.” Thompson completely sided with Andrews, noting she "bites her tongue" when people talk to her about football."I know exactly what you're saying. I almost got into a fight one time at the airport," Charissa added."There was a game on at the bar. You say something and someone goes, 'What do you know about football? And it's like, 'Oh here we go, now I'm going to have to say something.' At this point in my life, I just bite my tongue."Their conversation highlighted the challenges fans, especially women, may face in public sports discussions and encouraged viewers to be mindful of their game-day environment.Andrews and Thompson have produced multiple episodes since last year’s championship.In a recent episode Andrews shared how much she enjoyed Super Bowl LVIII in Las Vegas. She described the vibrant atmosphere, exciting events, and memorable experiences surrounding the game. Andrews and her co-host, Charissa Thompson, often discuss a variety of topics on their podcast, ranging from Taylor Swift's Eras Tour to the latest NFL playoffs, giving fans an inside look at sports, entertainment, and personal experiences."I really hope I'm still employed by Fox when Fox gets a Vegas Super Bowl," Andrews said."This is epic, it's Tuesday, it's nutty, I wish the weather was better, but this is crazy.It's probably best not for my future employment that I'm not there," she said."Because we know I do not have any kind of governor when it comes to these things."Her comments reflected both her enthusiasm for the event and her awareness of Las Vegas’ reputation for non stop excitement.Also Read: "I would like a marriage": FOX Sports reporter Erin Andrews believes Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are ready for the next big relationship milestone
Article Summary: Erin andrews advised super bowl fans not to watch the game alone at a bar. Co-host charissa thompson shared a similar experience, highlighting challenges in public sports discussions. Andrews and thompson have released dozens of episodes since last year's super bowl.

Before the game, they were on the field for a while.Megan Thee Stallion was seen sporting a yellow ensemble while attending the Super Bowl purple carpet.Before the game began, President Donald Trump even walked on the field during his appearance at the Super Bowl.Before the game, Kevin Costner, the face of Yellowstone, also posed for pictures on the field.All Directioners hail! Article Title: Are Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift still dating? Exploring viral breakup rumors
Article Text:
Are Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift still dating (Image Source: Getty)

Will Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift break up? Travis Kelce Says Chiefs Are Confident In Themselves, "Hear All The Outside Noise" | Pat McAfee Show There have been viral rumors for a while around Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift 's breakup. Fans have been wondering if they are on verge of breaking their relationship, almost a year after dating each other. Every now and then these rumors starts to speculate and here's everything you need to know about the current dating status of the Chiefs couple:Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift are still dating. Even though there have been rumors that the two are having hard times together, that's indeed not the case. The Chiefs tight end gives slight hints into his ongoing romance with the Blank Space singer every now and then, confirming that their romance is going high and fine.The rumors speculated after Taylor Swift didn't appear in any Kansas City Chiefs' game, following her last appearance in Chiefs vs Texans last month. But nevertheless, Kelce's recent statement about Swift proved that they are indeed not breaking up. The tight end made an appearance on the "Pat McAfee Show" on Monday.During his time at the show, Kelce opened up about his experience being with Taylor Swift, especially around her creative process. Travis Kelce recalled a dinner date with the All Too Well singer and he dealt with it when she suddenly got an idea. Talking about how he often deals with such situations, Kelce said:"Let's just say you're hanging and out and having a little dinner, and all of a sudden the creative juice sparks. And the absolute beast that you're sitting with who is going to go down as maybe the most famous icon in the history of music ... Are you a motivator every single time?"I’ll never chime in. But I’m here to support it. I’m here to see where it can go. I thought the European crowds were crazy. But I got to go to the last night at Lucas Oil and they were going nuts. I’ve seen that thing rocking when the Colts are playing, they might’ve had that thing rocking even more," the tight end further added.Moving forward in the show, Travis Kelce also talked about how some fans use Taylor Swift to bet on the Chiefs win. Swift have proven to be a lucky charm for the team and fans use this to bet money on the Chiefs’ win. Revealing details into the fans' Swift-inspired betting trick, Kelce said:"I just want to let you know what live bettors do. They see her walk into that stadium, [they] immediately open the phone like, ‘Yep, Chiefs are about to win.’ That is just literally the feel."The NFL Playoffs' Divisional Round is almost around the corner and fans have been wondering how the Chiefs will be performing against the Texans. While the team prepares for their upcoming clash, Travis Kelce shed light on his trust on Patrick Mahomes' leadership.
Article Summary: Travis kelce and taylor swift are still dating. The tight end made an appearance on the "pat mcafee show" on monday. Kelce opened up about his experience being with taylor swift, especially around her creative process. He also talked about how some fans use taylor swift to bet on the chiefs win.

Article Title: Super Bowl 59 Ticket Prices Are 17% Cheaper Than Last Year’s; Find Out Why
Article Text:
The stage is set for this year’s Super Bowl. Source: Getty

From Size Of The Venue to Fan Fatigue, A Few Key Factors Decide Super Bowl Ticket Prices

Super Bowl 59 may very well be one of the most talked-about and heavily publicised Super Bowls in NFL history. Not only is the Kansas City Chiefs aiming for a rare three-peat, but the team’s tight end Travis Kelce is in a relationship with the most popular pop star of her generation, Taylor Swift. However, ticket prices this year for Super Bowl LIX are down significantly ahead of Sunday's game.StubHub reported this week that the "Get In" price was $3,229 which is 5 per cent lower than the previous day and down 43 per cent compared to this time last year. However, StubHub spokesperson Adam Budelli recently broke down why there are a few practical reasons for this.According to reports, more than 4,700 tickets are available on StubHub on Wednesday night. The average ticket price has reportedly dropped to about $6,900, which marks a 17% drop from last year. However, Budelli explains that this is not unnatural since the price drop depends upon the Caesars Superdome’s ability to accommodate over 15,000 more fans, the availability of hotel rooms, and to some extent, fan fatigue.There are 74,295 seats and six levels in the Caesars Superdome. However, the two suite levels at the Superdome are privately owned and hence exclusive. 7 per cent of all tickets sold have been buyers from Kansas or Missouri, which is surprising since this is a big game for the Kansas City Chiefs.But Budelli shares, “They’ve seen their team win. It’s hard to justify spending $10,000, year after year, if you’ve already seen it.” Budelli told AP that some tickets are still available, but they are being sold quickly.Also Read: What is Super Bowl and why is everyone googling it? “Compared to last year, which was the most expensive Super Bowl in history on StubHub, that’s actually down 56%, making this Super Bowl much more approachable — I don’t want to say affordable — when compared to last year,” Budelli said.As per Ticketmaster, historically, the average resale ticket to the Super Bowl has ranged between $4,000 and $6,000; the platform has also pointed out that the ticket price “fluctuates drastically” based on the game's location, the lineup, seat location, and date of purchase.Budelli also pointed out that the venue for last year’s Super Bowl was a big reason for the inflated prices of its tickets. Last year, the game was held in Las Vegas and the three-hour game was turned into a week full of festivities for attending fans which hiked up the prices. Budelli shared that this year’s ticket prices are more in line with the 2023 rates.We’ve seen a 14% increase in ticket purchases from Kansas City Chiefs fans. Now, the gap is around 15% from Pennsylvania and about 9% from Kansas and Missouri. While it still favours the Eagles, the numbers may improve for Chiefs fans as the weekend progresses," he added.Typically Super Bowl tickets get cheaper from two weeks out, reaching their lowest price on game day. In 2024, Gametime's cheapest Super Bowl ticket declined from $9,400 two weeks out to $7,100 the day of the game, which marks a 24% drop.
Article Summary: Stubhub reported this week that the "get in" price was $3,229 which is 5 per cent lower than the previous day. More than 4,700 tickets are available on stubhub on wednesday night. The average ticket price has reportedly dropped to about $6,900, which marks a 17% drop from last year.

Article Title: Jon Batiste: Who is Jon Batiste? Everything to know about Super Bowl 59 anthem singer's songs, lyrics & more
Article Text:
Courtesy of David Needleman

Jon Batiste’s Musical Journey: From Street Performances to Grammy Wins



Super Bowl LIX: What to Expect



If there’s one thing we can all agree on, it’s that the Super Bowl isn’t just about football—it’s about the spectacle, the halftime show, and of course, that iconic national anthem moment. And this year, none other than the multi-talented Jon Batiste will be delivering the “Star-Spangled Banner” before the big game kicks off.Born into the legendary Batiste family in Metairie, Louisiana, Jon Batiste has been breathing music since day one. He started on drums, but by 11, the piano had stolen his heart. He trained at the New Orleans Center for Creative Arts and later polished his skills at Juilliard in New York. From street performances (he calls them "love riots") to global tours, this man has lived and breathed music across more than 40 countries.If you don't know Batiste from his viral street performances, you probably recognize him as the former bandleader on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert. But that's just one piece of his insane career. Now let's talk about the hardware: an Academy Award for his work on Disney/Pixar's Soul , a Golden Globe, a BAFTA, a Critics' Choice Award, and oh, just five Grammy wins in one night for his album WE ARE—including Album of the Year in 2022!Batiste's musical fingerprints are everywhere. He's worked with Stevie Wonder, Prince, Willie Nelson, Lenny Kravitz, and Ed Sheeran—to name a few. He's also the Creative Director of the National Jazz Museum in Harlem and the Music Director for The Atlantic. Basically, if it involves music and culture, Batiste has probably had a hand in it.Batiste isn’t just singing the national anthem; he’s bringing soul, jazz, and a whole lot of energy to the Super Bowl stage. Expect a rendition that’s powerful, heartfelt, and uniquely Batiste. If his past performances are anything to go by, we might even see a surprise twist or two.So as the players prepare for a battle of glory in the Super Bowl, Jon Batiste is going to be the one that sets the tone for this upcoming legendary performance. Whether this is your game or you're just here for the music, one thing is for sure—the moment when Batiste comes on will not soon be forgotten.Also read - “She’s a Trump Fan!” – Donald Trump Predicts Chiefs Will Win Super Bowl, Praises Patrick Mahomes’ Wife
Article Summary: Jon batiste will sing the national anthem at super bowl lix. He's known for his viral street performances and grammy wins. Batiste has worked with stevie wonder, prince, willie nelson, lenny kravitz, and ed sheeran.

If that holds, this year’s game should end around. However, game length can vary due to penalties, reviews, and commercials.The actual playtime is, split into. Clock stoppages can add significant time, especially with frequent TV timeouts.Super Bowl 47 holds the record as the longest game in NFL history by duration. The Baltimore Ravens edged out the San Francisco 49ers 34-31 in a game that lasted 4 hours and 14 minutes, partly due to a 34-minute second-half delay caused by a power outage at the Superdome.In another record-breaking game, Super Bowl 58 became the longest NFL championship based on playing time. The Kansas City Chiefs defeated the 49ers in overtime with a game-winning touchdown by Mecole Hardman, sealing victory with just 3 seconds remaining in OT after 74 minutes and 57 seconds of play.Halftime for a regular NFL game lasts, but Super Bowl halftimes are longer—averaging around. Historically, Super Bowl games last approximately 3 hours and 38 minutes, which would place the conclusion around 10:08 p.m. Eastern Time. Article Title: Meet Ledisi who is singing the black national anthem at the super bowl 59 and why is it controversial?
Article Text:

Lift Every Voice and Sing

Chiefs vs. Eagles Super Bowl showdown and how to watch it

Read More:



Check out our live coverage of Super Bowl LIX and find details on how to watch Super Bowl live on Times of India.



The Super Bowl is bringing all the drama this year. The Kansas City Chiefs face off against the Philadelphia Eagles on February 9, and while fans are hyped about Kendrick Lamar and SZA at halftime, a pre-game performance is sparking serious debate. Grammy winner Ledisi will singthe Black national anthem . Yeah, the same anthem that’s got half of Twitter raging and some NFL fans screaming "boycott."This isn’t some random new anthem.was written by James Weldon Johnson in 1899, originally as a poem for Abraham Lincoln’s birthday. His brother, John Rosamond Johnson, composed the music. It was first performed by 500 Black students at a segregated school. By 1919, the NAACP made it their official song, cementing it as a key part of Black cultural identity.Fast forward to 2020—after the killing of George Floyd and the protests that followed, the NFL added the anthem to pre-game ceremonies toCue immediate backlash.For a lot of conservatives, the whole idea of a separate anthem doesn’t sit well. Megyn Kelly fired off last year, saying,But here’s the kicker. For many,is about visibility. Democratic congressman Ritchie Torres summed it up:The NFL is finally acknowledging its messy racial past—something it was forced to confront after Colin Kaepernick’s protests in 2016 shook the league.Ledisi Anibade Young isn’t new to controversy—or greatness. Born in New Orleans and raised in Oakland, she’s been killing it for over 20 years with R&B, gospel, and jazz hits. She’s got Grammy wins and nominations to back it up too. This year, she’ll take center stage withjoining Jon Batiste, who’s handling the national anthem, and Lauren Daigle with Trombone Shorty, singingDespite Ledisi's talent, not everyone is here for it. Social media is already buzzing with outrage. Comments likeare everywhere. Some fans still haven’t forgiven the NFL for taking a stance on race post-George Floyd.This is about more than a song. It’s about the NFL’s ongoing racial reckoning. After sidelining Kaepernick and ignoring police brutality, they can’t just sweep things under the rug anymore. The performance ofsends a message: Black history and voices won’t be erased. Whether fans like it or not, it’s happening.At 52, Ledisi continues to shine in her musical journey. She released her debut album,in 2000 and has since produced 11 studio albums. Her latest,was released just last year. In 2024, she was honored with an honorary doctorate from the prestigious Berklee College of Music.Throughout her career, Ledisi has earned notable accolades, including a Grammy Award in 2021 for Best Traditional R&B Performance with her rendition offrom the 2020 albumShe has also claimed two Soul Train Music Awards.If you can handle the off-field drama, here’s where to catch the game:Super Bowl 59 is setting up to be one hell of a showdown. Will Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs make history by becoming the first team to win three consecutive titles? Or will Jalen Hurts and the Philadelphia Eagles finally take revenge for their 2023 defeat? Either way, expect fireworks—on and off the field.
Article Summary: The kansas city chiefs face off against the philadelphia eagles on february 9. Grammy winner ledisi will sing the black national anthem. The anthem was written by james weldon johnson in 1899, originally as a poem for abraham lincoln’s birthday. It was first performed by 500 black students at a segregated school.

Article Title: Taylor Swift sparks pregnancy rumours as Travis Kelce's friend revealed that Swift gasped as Kelce said the word “baby”
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift sparks pregnancy rumours with new update from Travis Kelce's friend



Check out our live coverage of Super Bowl LIX and find details on how to watch Super Bowl live on Times of India.



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's friend, Adam Lefkoe, was talking to them about announcing their baby in October 2024 while attending a New York Yankees game . They were discussing Lefkoe's 1-year-old son, Prince. Lefkoe appeared on the Steam Room podcast and told listeners that Swift gasped as Kelce said the word "baby."Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift's relationship is gaining attention, with sports broadcaster Adam Lefkoe sharing a behind-the-scenes moment from an October 2024 Yankees game, where Swift's reaction to the word "baby" sparked conversation.Lefkoe and Kelce discussed their son Prince on the Steam Room podcast, sparking excitement when Kelce mentioned "baby" to Lefkoe's son, Prince. "She gasped and said, 'Baby? Let me see!'" Lefkoe recounted. The pop superstar then walked over to admire Prince, telling Lefkoe, "That might be the cutest baby I've ever seen." Lefkoe joked that he couldn't have agreed more, adding that Swift was "so cool, so nice, and exactly what you want her to be like.”Lefkoe highlighted Swift's impact on the atmosphere at the Yankees vs. Guardians game, stating that her presence significantly altered the atmosphere. "Every woman in the suite wasn't watching the game; they were just watching Taylor," he said. Lefkoe noticed that when Kelce made her laugh, the entire group around them also laughed, even if they didn't hear the conversation.Lefkoe and his wife, Dr. Inem Akpan, were escorted through multiple checkpoints to join Swift and Kelce during the intense security measures for the night. "It was the biggest security presence I've ever seen," he admitted. He also gave Swift credit for tipping the security team at the end of the night.Also Read: Taylor Swift feeling manipulated by Blake Lively in Justin Baldoni's lawsuit, raising concerns about potential 'Bad Blood' between the two ahead of Super Bowl Swift, who has been dating Kelce since summer 2023, will attend Chiefs games as the team gears up for the Super Bowl, according to Kelce's brother Jason. Kylie Kelce, wife of Jason Kelce, announced that their three daughters, Wyatt, Elliotte, and Bennett, will wear "Go Uncle Trav" shirts at the big game. With Swift in the stands and Kelce on the field, Sunday's game is sure to be a spectacle both on and off the field.
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce's friend, adam lefkoe, was talking to them about announcing their baby in october 2024 while attending a new york yankees game. The pop superstar gasped as kelce said the word "baby," sparking conversation. Swift will attend chiefs games as team gears up for the super bowl.

"New Heights"

With Super Bowl LIX on the horizon, one big question looms over Kansas City Chiefs star Travis Kelce—will this be his final game? While Kelce hasn’t made an official decision, there’s plenty of speculation about whether he’ll hang up his cleats after the season or return for another year.Kelce signed a two-year contract extension in 2024, keeping him with the Chiefs through 2025. However, that doesn’t necessarily mean he’ll play another season. His $19.8 million cap hit in 2025 could impact the Chiefs’ roster decisions, and Kelce himself has admitted he’ll need time after the Super Bowl to think about his future before free agency begins on March 12.Several factors could determine whether Kelce retires or returns:If Kelce does retire, he has plenty of opportunities outside the NFL. He’s already a media superstar with his hit podcast,, and he could easily transition into TV, acting, or even sports broadcasting. Plus, with his high-profile relationship with Taylor Swift, he might enjoy having more free time to travel and support her career.For now, Travis Kelce’s future remains uncertain, but NFL insiders believe his decision will “hinge” on the Super Bowl’s outcome. Whether he’s back for one more season or calling it quits, all eyes will be on Kelce as the Chiefs take the field for Super Bowl LIX!Also read - “I wouldn’t give a s**t” – DJ Mustard Shuts Down Super Bowl Halftime Show Rumors, Won’t Perform with Kendrick Lamar
Article Summary: Travis kelce hasn’t made an official decision, but there’s plenty of speculation about whether he’ll hang up his cleats after the season or return for another year. Kelce signed a two-year contract extension in 2024, keeping him with the chiefs through 2025.

Article Title: Travis Kelce and Patrick Mahomes set to gift Rolex worth close to $22,000 to Chiefs members if they win Super Bowl LIX, with a Caribbean vacation planned
Article Text:

Travis Kelce And Patrick Mahomes Are All Set To Gift Rolex Watches Worth Close To $22,000 To 65 Members Of The Kansas City Chiefs



Travis Kelce & Patrick Mahomes’ Luxury Super Bowl Celebration Plans—$200K on Champagne

Super Bowl LIX Is Just Few Hours Away And Fans Are Losing Their Minds



The Super Bowl LIX is finally here, a few hours away from us as the 2024 season of NFL comes to an end. Both Kansas City Chiefs and the Philadelphia Eagles are busy gearing up to face each other. But it seems like Kansas City Chiefs’ star players, Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce are pretty confident about winning the championship this season and have already looked for a luxurious gift for the whole team of Chiefs.As per the U.S. Sun, two of the most popular players of the Kansas City Chiefs, Travis Kelce and Patrick Mahomes have thought about gifting two models of luxurious Rolex watches to 65 members of the Kansas City Chiefs team.This includes a $21,400 Cosmograph Daytona and a $19,650 Sea Dweller. As per the U.S. Sun, a source has revealed, "It’s very important for them to show love to their teammates and be great examples on and off the field. They want to give presents to show how much they appreciate everyone's hard work and commitment to the team and the franchise."But that’s not it; a trip to the exotic Caribbean Islands has also been planned if the Kansas City Chiefs manage to defeat the Philadelphia Eagles today and take the trophy home.Patrick Mahomes has always been the one who has surprised his team with expensive and luxurious gifts. Back in December 2024 too, as a gift for Christmas, the quarterback curated a gift package for everyone which included - Oakley sunglasses, cowboy boots, a luxurious Rolex watch for all and a Yeti cooler.This time it seems like that Travis Kelce has also joined Patrick Mahomes in pampering his teammates. The brotherhood and bond of the Kansas City Chiefs players have always been spoken about and credited for the success that the team has seen on the field.Both Travis Kelce and Patrick Mahomes are honouring the bond that they all share with each other.With just a few more hours to go for the Super Bowl LIX to begin, there is excitement as well as stress among fans. Many believe that the Saquon Barkley led Philadelphia Eagles will end the Kansas City Chiefs winning streak at the Super Bowl and win the trophy this year.Others believe that the Kansas City Chiefs will again win the championship this year and create history.This is the second time that the Philadelphia Eagles are facing the Kansas City Chiefs in the Super Bowl after the 2023 championship when the Chiefs had won.Also Read: Taylor Swift finds new friends for Super Bowl LIX, replacing Blake Lively amid Justin Baldoni controversy
Article Summary: Travis kelce and patrick mahomes are all set to gift rolex watches worth close to $22,000 to 65 members of the kansas city chiefs team. This includes a $21,400 cosmograph daytona and a $19,650 sea dweller. A trip to the exotic caribbean islands has also been planned if the chiefs manage to defeat the philadelphia eagles.

The Super Bowl Halftime Show is one of the most talked-about live performances of the year, featuring some of the world's biggest musical acts. Taylor Swift has been the talk of the NFL, and with her boyfriend, Travis Kelce, playing in the Super Bowl finals, the excitement is at an all-time high. A collaboration between Swift and Kendrick Lamar would elevate the halftime show, merging two powerhouse artists from different musical worlds. Here's why they should perform together.Taylor Swift and Kendrick Lamar have already proved they can work magic with their hit. Their contrasting styles—Swift's melodic storytelling and Lamar's sharp lyricism—vividly blend, illustrating that pop and hip-hop can unite for something spectacular.A Super Bowl performance featuring both artists would be dynamic and unexpected. Swift’s theatrical stage presence paired with Lamar’s electrifying delivery could result in a halftime show that appeals to a broad audience. Individually, they are captivating performers; together, they could deliver a career-defining moment.The best Super Bowl Halftime Shows appeal to diverse audiences, and Swift and Lamar bring together fans from pop, hip-hop, and R&B. Their combined musical reach would ensure a performance that resonates across generations.A well-curated setlist could focus on each act's strengths, moving from powerful anthemic hits by Swift to strong rap verses by Lamar. It would surely be a different halftime performance and give energy to the show that no previous show had.Besides her musical compatibility, a Swift-Lamar collaboration will have cultural implications. Swift already pushed NFL ratings to unprecedented highs; her half-time show performance would just escalate the frenzy further.Lamar is associated with performances of greater depth; thus, more than just artistry, they carry a significant message. In his presence, this halftime would not only entertain but also mark history. Collectively, the two could have created a moment beyond music for the Super Bowl stage.Taylor Swift and Kendrick Lamar would provide the musical excellence and genre-blending spectacle, yet cultural relevance-a perfect pairing for the Super Bowl. Their collective influence makes it a perfect marriage for the league to consider a halftime show with this combination for years to talk about.Also Read: Lionel Messi to Attend Super Bowl LIX? Taylor swift has been the talk of the nfl, and with her boyfriend, travis kelce, playing in the super bowl finals, the excitement is at an all-time high. Article Title: GOAT is in the Building: Lionel Messi Arrives to watch the Super Bowl LIX Live
Article Text:
Image via Twitter

Super Bowl LIX Updates: Lionel Messi has arrived at the Super Bowl



A few days ago, rumors were circulating on the internet that football GOAT Lionel Messi might attend Super Bowl LIX to witness the showdown between the Eagles and the Chiefs. Now, those rumors have come true, as Messi has officially arrived in New Orleans to watch Super Bowl 2025 live. The NFL is a global spectacle that attracts celebrities from all industries, and Messi’s presence perfectly complements the event’s star-studded atmosphere, alongside other high-profile figures like Bradley Cooper, Miles Teller, and Pete Davidson.Argentina and Inter Miami superstar Lionel Messi has arrived at Super Bowl LIX in New Orleans. The forward was spotted alongside his three sons—Thiago, Mateo, and Ciro. Interestingly, the family doesn’t appear to have a clear favorite. While Mateo and Ciro sported Patrick Mahomes’ jersey, Thiago, the eldest, was seen wearing an Eagles shirt.Lionel Messi, widely regarded as the greatest soccer player of all time, made his presence felt at Super Bowl LIX as he attended the showdown between the Chiefs and Eagles for the Vince Lombardi Trophy. Speculation about his attendance had been mounting throughout the week, especially after Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes openly expressed his admiration for Messi."Messi is the GOAT of his profession, and having someone like him at the game would be incredible," Mahomes had stated. Though his appearance wasn’t confirmed beforehand, Messi surprised fans by arriving at the stadium to witness the high-stakes clash—despite having played a friendly match in Honduras just a day earlier with his club, Inter Miami, against Olimpia.His presence at Super Bowl LIX not only highlighted the magnitude of the event but also showcased the deep respect shared among top-tier athletes across different sports. The Argentine icon has frequently been seen at NBA games as well, particularly those featuring the Miami Heat, the team from his current home city.
Article Summary: Argentina and inter miami superstar lionel messi has arrived at super bowl lix in new orleans. Speculation about his attendance had been mounting throughout the week, especially after chiefs quarterback patrick mahomes openly expressed his admiration for messi. Messi surprised fans by arriving at the stadium to witness the high-stakes clash.

Article Title: Super Bowl LIX Scores and Updates: The Philadelphia Eagles got the first point
Article Text:
Image via NFL.com

Super Bowl LIX Current Score: Philadelphia Eagles got the first point



Philadelphia Eagles fans erupted in excitement as quarterback Jalen Hurts connected with wide receiver Jahan Dotson on a 27-yard pass up the sideline, initially ruled a touchdown with 6:30 remaining in the first quarter. However, after review, officials determined Dotson was down at the 1-yard line. On the following play, the Eagles turned to their signature Tush Push , with Hurts being propelled over the goal line for his fourth career Super Bowl rushing touchdown. Jake Elliott’s extra point extended the lead to 7-0.After forcing a punt by pressuring Patrick Mahomes into a third-down incompletion, the Eagles took over at their own 32-yard line following a 12-yard return from rookie Cooper DeJean. Two plays later, they crossed midfield for the first time when Jalen Hurts connected with tight end Dallas Goedert for a 20-yard gain. After a pair of short runs by Saquon Barkley, the Eagles faced a third down.Hurts' third-down pass sailed too high for Goedert, but a crucial penalty on cornerback Trent McDuffie for a hit to the head on a defenseless receiver kept the drive alive. That call could prove pivotal, and now the Chiefs will look to respond.The Kansas City Chiefs are chasing history with a potential Super Bowl "three-peat," while the Philadelphia Eagles seek redemption in a highly anticipated rematch of Super Bowl LVII. The two teams will clash on Feb. 9 in New Orleans, setting the stage for another thrilling showdown.Despite their impressive 15-2 record, the Chiefs had a shaky run, covering the spread in just eight of 17 games (8-9 ATS), per Covers.com. Meanwhile, the Eagles finished 14-3 and fared better against the spread at 11-6. StatMuse reports that the Chiefs ranked 11th in the NFL with a regular-season point differential of +59, while the Eagles secured the second spot with a +160 differential. All eyes will be on Super Bowl LIX at Caesars Superdome in New Orleans to see who emerges victorious.
Article Summary: The kansas city chiefs are chasing history with a potential super bowl "three-peat," while the philadelphia eagles seek redemption in a highly anticipated rematch of super bowl lvii. The two teams will clash on feb. 9 in new orleans, setting the stage for another thrilling showdown.
